babel-desc: Zayd awur #babel lli radd immurzm s utumatik yat tanaka (taznbilt) nu umsqdac Babil d mas rad yaf an ig timuḍimin n idɣarn.
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Middn ɣ talɣa yad ar mmaln mas llan ɣ uswir n $1 i tutlayt n $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Middn ɣ talɣa yad ar mlan mas-d darsn tusna ɣ  tutlayt $1.
babel-0: {{GENDER:$4|Asmras|Tasmrast}} ad [[$1|ur]] dars tussna ɣ [[$2|$3]] (nɣ ar tt ittrmas s tmmara iggutn).
babel-2: {{GENDER:$4|Asmras|Tasmrast}} ad dars tusna s uswir [[$1|anamas]] ɣ [[$2|$3]].
babel-4: {{GENDER:$4|Asmras|Tasmrast}} ad dars yat tussna yaẓn i [[$1|tin umssiwl anṣli]] n [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: {{GENDER:$4|Asmras|Tasmrast}} ad [[$1|ur]] dars kra n tussna ɣ [[$2|Taclḥit)]] (nɣ ar tt ittrmas s tmmara iggutn).
babel-2-n: {{GENDER:$4|Asmras|Tasmrast}} ad dars tusna s [[$1|uswir anamas]] ɣ [[$2|Taclḥit]].
babel-4-n: {{GENDER:$4|Asmras|Tasmrast}} ad dars yat tussna yaẓn i [[$1|tin umssiwl anṣli]] ɣ [[$2|Taclḥit]].
